properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.access-key
properties.description: Access key for the associated azure account name to be used for authentication with azure blob services

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blob-name
properties.description: The blob name, to consume specific blob from a container. However, on producer it is only required for the operations on the blob level

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blob-offset
properties.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blob-sequence-number
properties.description: A user-controlled value that you can use to track requests. The value of the sequence number must be between 0 and 263 - 1.The default value is 0.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blob-type
properties.description: The blob type in order to initiate the appropriate settings for each blob type

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.block-list-type
properties.description: Specifies which type of blocks to return.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.change-feed-context
properties.description: When using getChangeFeed producer operation, this gives additional context that is passed through the Http pipeline during the service call. The option is a com.azure.core.util.Context type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.change-feed-end-time
properties.description: When using getChangeFeed producer operation, this filters the results to return events approximately before the end time. Note: A few events belonging to the next hour can also be returned. A few events belonging to this hour can be missing; to ensure all events from the hour are returned, round the end time up by an hour. The option is a java.time.OffsetDateTime type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.change-feed-start-time
properties.description: When using getChangeFeed producer operation, this filters the results to return events approximately after the start time. Note: A few events belonging to the previous hour can also be returned. A few events belonging to this hour can be missing; to ensure all events from the hour are returned, round the start time down by an hour. The option is a java.time.OffsetDateTime type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close-stream-after-read
properties.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close-stream-after-write
properties.description: Close the stream after write or keep it open, default is true

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.commit-block-list-later
properties.description: When is set to true, the staged blocks will not be committed directly.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.configuration
properties.description: The component configurations. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.azure.storage.blob.BlobConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.create-append-blob
properties.description: When is set to true, the append blocks will be created when committing append blocks.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.create-page-blob
properties.description: When is set to true, the page blob will be created when uploading page blob.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.credential-type
properties.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.credentials
properties.description: StorageSharedKeyCredential can be injected to create the azure client, this holds the important authentication information. The option is a com.azure.storage.common.StorageSharedKeyCredential type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.data-count
properties.description: How many bytes to include in the range. Must be greater than or equal to 0 if specified.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.download-link-expiration
properties.description: Override the default expiration (millis) of URL download link.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the azure-storage-blob component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.file-dir
properties.description: The file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to, this can be used in both, producer and consumer

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.max-results-per-page
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of blobs to return, including all BlobPrefix elements. If the request does not specify maxResultsPerPage or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.max-retry-requests
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of additional HTTP Get requests that will be made while reading the data from a response body.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.operation
properties.description: The blob operation that can be used with this component on the producer

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.page-blob-size
properties.description: Specifies the maximum size for the page blob, up to 8 TB. The page blob size must be aligned to a 512-byte boundary.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.prefix
properties.description: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names begin with the specified prefix. May be null to return all blobs.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.regex
properties.description: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names match the specified regular expression. May be null to return all if both prefix and regex are set, regex takes the priority and prefix is ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.service-client
properties.description: Client to a storage account. This client does not hold any state about a particular storage account but is instead a convenient way of sending off appropriate requests to the resource on the service. It may also be used to construct URLs to blobs and containers. This client contains operations on a service account. Operations on a container are available on BlobContainerClient through BlobServiceClient#getBlobContainerClient(String), and operations on a blob are available on BlobClient through BlobContainerClient#getBlobClient(String). The option is a com.azure.storage.blob.BlobServiceClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.source-blob-access-key
properties.description: Source Blob Access Key: for copyblob operation, sadly, we need to have an accessKey for the source blob we want to copy Passing an accessKey as header, it's unsafe so we could set as key.

properties.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.timeout
properties.description: An optional timeout value beyond which a RuntimeException will be raised. The option is a java.time.Duration type.
